Переапанные маньяки, хитбоксы оружий которые больше чем их модель на метр (БЕЗ ПРИУВЕЛЕЧЕНИЯ).
Из интересной, иногда страшной с элементами стелса игры, ДБД скатили в обычные догонялки с неравными шансами, занерфили кучу интересных перков у обеих сторон и не трогают лишь самые популярные, из которые многие в какой то степени имбовые.
Разработчики зачем то сделали охуеть какую высокую гамму, наверное чтоб каждый ман-мейнер с всратым разрешением 4 на 3 выдел сурва за пол карты.
Вместо новых обновлений и механик делают лишь коллабы и новые длс, которые разработчики щедро клипают за месяц - два, с чаще всего одним, а то и нулем играбельных перков.
Я понимаю, что большое количество долбаебов - казуальщиков, ставящие костыли в виде 4 на 3 считающие что сурвы - имба будут возражать, таких я попрошу сыграть не фулл пати с чуваками по 2000 часов, а в соло - дуо против маньяка с красными аддонами и мета перками.
Советую к приобретению!

要分兩回事來說，如果你喜歡玩生存者，這款遊戲不值得購買，因為每次改版後都係偏幫殺手，一班變態gm只喜歡虐待生存者，遊戲與其他三人互不相識，出現很多自私行為及不合作沒有團隊精神，這是gm沒法預計及平衡也令到生存者進一步收窄，生存者逃跑的腳印本來五秒現在已改到十秒，令玩家使用逃生者越玩越憤怒，我個人只喜歡玩生存者，所以不值得建議購買這隻垃圾遊戲！如果你喜歡殺手的話，可以一試無妨～但如果你勝利後，不知天高地厚的殺手還要叫囂，最後必定給生存者或其他玩家問候你全家！
新颖的非对称对抗模式，前期极具吸引力的游戏体验，后期对抗中的心理博弈，都是这款游戏富有魅力的体现。当然不足在于各种bug和匹配机制可能导致游戏无法正常游玩。

Fun game but the cons outweigh the positives. 
The Developers of the game don't seem to prioritize fixing simple bugs in the game. Also, whenever they release a new killer, it is insanely overpowered. 
They take forever to fix this to suit the game's current state. People instantly DC once they see certain new killers being played. 

The community is extremely toxic and the game is designed to facilitate farmers. That is, where a killer is friends with one of the survivors who they let run around freely to stack all the bloodpoints. 

Additionally, the Developers don't care about toxic reports to other players. I have had players look up my profile and said where I'm from is a poor country and this is because I'm black. I am still waiting feedback from this report. Does it have any feedback for reports anyway? Even Overwatch gives you feedback. 

I see potential in this game, but the lack of punishment to toxic players would lead to its demise. I do believe that they can fix these issues though. But only time will tell.

制作组牛逼哦，从入坑开始就一直针对我。一开始只玩本命军团，然后重做做废了，刚打算练护士，一转五十级了，护士砍了。换了耳机玩凛妹，凛妹挨了一刀。弗莱迪刚三转点完必须的技能，双绳子削了。现在又他妈削毁灭，厉害了我的智障组，玩不起脱坑还不行吗？！再见了您嘞！

TLDR: Really fun and satisfying gameplay loop on both sides and lots of exciting push and pull moments on which side is winning during a game. Can be very tense, atmospheric and is really fun with friends. Devs clearly care about the game but the game has it's fair share of toxic players and playing killer might become a negative experience if you climb the ranks high enough in a season.
     
   Onto the full review...I put more then a few hours into this game and I have to say that it is the absolute best multiplayer horror game you can find out there. Starting with some huge positives, the game has tons of players. Especially at lower ranks, you should never have trouble finding a game if you are playing survivor. You might have to wait a bit longer for killer, but it shouldn't really be that long unless you make it the very high ranks.

     The devs are ultra transparent with updates and patches, and they consistently update the game. They host live streams to give you details on what new stuff is coming down the pipe, and let you test new features on a PTB before the changes go live. The game is at its core, very fun for both survivor and killer. When playing survivor, being chased by the killer is extremely fun and tense. And when you do go down, you are not dead. You have multiple chances to survive and continue playing before you are killed and are actually eliminated. 

    Playing Killer is a bit harder then survivor, but extremely fun in my opinion. You get to be the big baddie that tracks and hunts down survivors. It feels rewarding to successfully mind game a survivor as the killer and land hits on them. Also because you are the power roll, you are supposed to dictate the flow of the game. I say supposed to because the game has always been very clearly in the survivors favor during the early days of the game. And good survivors know how to abuse this kind of stuff still.
     
    New content usually comes with new bugs. The devs seem to take one step forward and one step back with certain balance changes. And once you get to a high enough rank you will most likely run into survivors who will disconnect the moment they go down, or just bm you in game and/or maybe flame you in the end game chat. But that seems to just be the nature of any kind of pvp game. Keep in mind any toxicity I have ever experienced has only come from entitled survivor mains. Killers will usually say "gg" and move on. Another thing to keep in mind is that playing killer will become increasingly stressful and maybe even not fun the more you climb the ranks. Survivors will become way more competent and eat up loads of your time if you continue to chase and tunnel just one of them. And in my experience the better the survivor(s) think they are the higher your chances of getting t-bagged and bm'd. 

    Despite these flaws, I think the game is fantastic. It really is something special and I encourage you to give it a shot. The devs really care about this game and I genuinely believe they are trying their best to craft a fun experience for everyone. Some of the cons are negated entirely if you only play with your friends or don't care about ranking up anyway. So just have fun with it.

Alleine schon das DbB  Easy Anti Cheat nutzt, sollte Grund genug sein für eine negative Bewertung. Zudem startet es erst gar nicht und es kommt nur ein Fehlercode. Aber immer neue killer bringen die man kaufen muss, DRECKS by Daylight

Overall it's not bad .Yes it has it's cons like toxic players and rage-quitters. But i feel like nowadays you meet these cons in every single competitive multiplayer game (especially shooters).

I see all these negative reviews regarding finding a match. I rarely had any problems with finding a game. As long as you have good internet and you don't live in a country unheard of, you should be good.

Playing as the killer will sometimes make you feel like a maniac which is great if you're into that. But some survivors in the game tend to be toxic. I do not recommend you playing as the killer if you're easily offended,especially at higher ranks where the survivors are good. But if you aren't weak mentally then you shouldn't have any problems.

Being a survivor in my opinion is not that scary but i've seen some people who nearly pee themselves when they play as one.

When it comes to content I think it has plenty. Many unlockables in the game,including cosmetics.

Dead by Daylight can keep you busy for a quite a while. There are people with thousands of hours on the game. Mastering both killer and survivor takes some time, which is cool if you like not so easy competitive games.

In conclusion DBD is a very good game and there aren't many games out there like DBD. And no games of it's kind are at it's level

EDIT:I take my words back.This game is a matchmaking chaos, but that won't stop me from giving it a positive review. The game is still going strong. Lots of people play it and it has been launched in 2016.

Вы были обычным человеком но как-то раз СУЩНОСТЬ забрала вас в другой мир.Вы думаете что вы одни но потом встречаете ещё 3-ох выживших.Вы видите генераторы вам нужно их завести чтобы открыть ворота чтобы сбежать,от кого?!От тоже обычного человека но над которым судьба прошла мимо него.Его тоже забрала СУЩНОСТЬ и он должен вас убить(4 выживших).Но если маньяк убил 3-их а вы остались посреди местности можно встретить люк через которого можно также сбежать.Вам нужно прокачиваться чтобы было больше шансов сбежать от маньяка.Также вы тоже можете играть за маньяка и прокачивать его чтобы было больше шансов убить выживших которых забрала СУЩНОСТЬ.
